bulletin_message.00: Kind greetings! My name is Ember Minton, and I am a missionary for the Church of Plenty. We would be delighted to have a settlement such as yours count among one of Thị trấn chúng tôiships.

I'm Marak Azael, nice to meet you. It tickles my whiskers to see a settlement like yours, assembled from nothing in no time at all.

The very Ascendancy itself was built with saw and hammer by fine craftsfolk like yourselves! That's why the Guild means so much to me, and why I wanted to pay you a visit.

So! Now you've met the folks that tagged along with me - I'm impartial, here, so it's up to you to decide who you want as a Sponsor. I can say that they're all good choices, though!

I'm going to show them around town a little, but I'll leave the plans for each of their fountains and shrines and whatnot with your Masons.

Good to see you all again! I'll see you at the dedication ceremony for whichever you end up picking!

A Township dedicated to Cid's valorous example can serve as an anchor for a whole region, and embolden new settlers to forge their own new Outposts.

If you would choose to build a memorial to Cid, the Guard would be happy to share some of our knowledge of arms with you as part of the dedication ceremony.

Dedicating the Valor of Cid will grant you recipes for new, highest-tier weapons.

It is the Church's adage that 'Fortune favors the kind', and blessed fountains of Plenty are truly a blessing to the mind, body, and spirit of a Town's citizens.

Please consider showing the world that Thị trấn chúng ta will be one of kindness by building a shrine of the Church's design.

Dedicating a Fountain of Plenty will grant all of Thị trấn chúng tasfolk a +1 boost to the Mind, Body, and Spirit attributes.

Hello - I am Anwyn Torresi, Captain of Her Majesty's guard. She sends me with Her thanks for settling this untamed land, and for guarding it against animals and monsters alike.

We in the Guard follow the example of the Knight Cid, believing that standing brave and resolute against the wilderness is the only way for the Ascendancy to reclaim this lost land.

You have done the Ascendancy a great service by planting your Banner here.

The Crafters Guild! We believe that the skill of an artisan must be respected, and their works celebrated.

We at the Guild would love to sanction this Township as one fit to pursue mastery in crafts - and, after all, only we can truly know masterwork when we see it!

Dedicating a tribute to the Guildmaster's Skill will grant the ability to create Masterwork-quality furniture and decorations, which are considerably better than those of Chất lượng tuyệt vời.

Hello again, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]! Glad to see you all still going strong - not that I expected any different!

In fact, I've brought some folks along with me this time - I'll let them introduce themselves and tell you why they've come.

As he should be! With fine crafters like them, Thị trấn chúng ta will be churning out Masterworks in no time! I'll be keeping an eye out for a [str(i18n_data.town_name)] maker's mark in the Capital market in a few months!

Your homes all look pretty sturdy, too, come to think of it. My compliments to your Workers, they seem to know how to put things together, too!

Anyway, I'll let you get back to celebrating! I'm going to go hunt down a pint of something strong and a bowl of something hearty!

Remember, busy hands make a happy Town!

msg3.dialog_title: Marak claps you on the back

bulletin_message.00: Ha ha ha! What a fine monument you've built! Level, square, and all the finishing touches that only a trained eye such as mine could truly appreciate!</br></br><font size=-1>Huh, how'd you get it to glow like that, though?</font>

msg1.choice_000: Thank you! Our mason is quite proud.

bulletin_message.00:
Oh! I'm fine, I was just... remembering something.

You know, I really do believe in the Ascendancy, that we have a destiny to retake these lost lands. Every new Town that springs up serves to strengthen my belief.

But it's the Towns like yours, dedicated to the support our valorous Guard, that truly warm my heart.

I've brought along plans for the Guard's finest weapons, as you've surely earned the right to forge them.

Now, if my service has taught me anything, it's to eat a good meal when given the chance. I'll leave you to your celebrating!

What an inspiring monument! It truly speaks to the heroism of the Knight Cid.

It reminds me all over again why I became a member of the Guard. It feels like so long ago...

(Anwyn stares into the middle distance, eyes glistening.)

As this shrine bestows its blessing on you all, take a moment to reflect on the world, its mysteries, and its many bounties.

May Thị trấn chúng ta always be a happy home for its people, and a wellspring for the generosity of the Church of Plenty.
Now, enough somber platitudes - go enjoy the party! I think I saw Mer with some cake earlier that I'd love to get my hands on...

...and may this town flourish in fortune and prosperity, for so long as the Sun shall shine. Umbasa.

Oh! My apologies, I was lost in prayer.

You have a truly wonderful town here, and I feel so privileged to be the missionary to bless this fine monument.
Well, now, it seems my favorite little Outpost is all grown up! Congratulations on your newfound Township!

By the by, this monument here is special, since it's gotten blessed and all - you can build the others if you like, but they'll just be regular old statues. Fancy-looking ones, but none quite so magical.

Still, they make for a nice decoration, don't you think?

Thanks for being such a bunch of charming folks - I'm proud to serve a group of such earnest and ambitious individuals. You make me proud!

Farewell for now, and the best of luck to each of you!

msg3.choice_000: Farewell, Mer! It's been a pleasure!

bulletin_message.00:
Hello again! Now that you've got a bustling little town here, perhaps Đến lúc để start thinking of your next adventure.

I expect some of your citizens are itching to head out and establish a brand new town, even bigger, and even better, with all the lessons learned from this one.

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.

Take the time to consider what you consider most important, what you wish that beacon to stand for. Prosperity? Happiness? Strength? Each is a noble pursuit.

Wishing you the best of luck!

Yours in the Capital,
Mer Burlyhands

P.S. A small gift for you from my personal garden ❀

Congratulations on your Founding!

Your Outpost has been entered into the registry - consider yourselves official! "Her Majesty's Outpost of [str(i18n_data.town_name)]" - it has a nice ring to it, I think. An inspirational Banner design, as well!

All of us here are eager to hear of your success!

As your Outpost grows towards Settlement status, you will start to attract new immigrants.

Your Hearth now is only a spark of what it will one day become - I have faith that it will be a beacon seen all across the Ascendancy.

The messenger bird returns, with a reply from Mer Burlyhands.

The letter has bite marks, and is slightly drooled on. Harold is doing his best.

Which Shrine will you build to signify your Settlement's ascent into Township?

Shrine of Fortune (+1 Mind, Body, and Spirit for your citizens!)

Shrine of Valor (Legendary weapons)

Shrine of Masterwork (Unlocks Masterwork-tier crafts! Four times as Appealing and Expensive as Excellent-tier!)

guildmaster.name: The Guildmaster's Skill
guildmaster.description:
This Township shall be known for its artisans' hard work and dedication to their craft.
  • Allows crafting Chất lượng kiệt tác items
  • Unlocks artisan-themed decoration recipes

deity.name: Fountain of Plenty
deity.description:
This Township shall show generosity and kindness to the needy.
  • Blesses all citizens with +1 to Mind, Body, and Spirit
  • Unlocks nature-themed decoration recipes

valor.name: The Valor of Cid
valor.description:
This Township shall be dedicated to Cid's valorous example to protect the whole region.
  • Unlocks legendary weapon recipes
  • Unlocks castle decoration recipes

bulletin_message.00:
Next time I visit, I'll bring these folks along with me, and let them plead their cases. Decisions, decisions!

Until then!

Yours in the Capital,
 Mer Burlyhands

Dear [str(i18n_data.town_name)]-ites,

Word around the Capital is that your Settlement has grown since I last saw it, and that it's getting even more bustling by the day! Your Hearth must be burning brightly to attract so many new settlers.

In fact, it's also attracted the attention of a few notable individuals.

As you probably know, a settlement traditionally needs a Sponsorship to become a true Township - generally from a guild, the clergy, or the military.

In the past few days, I've been approached by a few individuals who are very interested to get a look at Thị trấn chúng ta for themselves, and see if you'd be interested in allowing them to be your Sponsor.
Looks like Mer is getting in touch with us again!

Hold in your mind a vision of what Thị trấn chúng ta will one day be. Your Banner will set that course, but it is up to you to finish it.

Choose well, my friends. I eagerly await your reply.


Yours,

 Mer Burlyhands

An odd bird arrives with a letter in its beak, stamped with the Official Seal of the Ascendancy.

The bird also carries a nametag, which reads 'Harold'

open_letter.choice_001: [skip] We know what banner we want.

bulletin_message.00:
Dear Cuộc thám hiểm [str(i18n_data.town_serial_number)],

I hope this letter finds you well. By my guess, you've likely set up camp by now.

As your Capital Liaison, it is my honor to preside, remotely, over the official Founding of your Outpost! I trust that you had ample time to choose a name on your journey.

As you know, every new settlement must choose a Banner.

This Banner reflects your spirit and vision, the uniting factor which brought the Expedition together!

What future did you foresee when you embarked on your quest for Township?
The odd messenger bird scurries off with your Official Settlement Founding Declaration in its beak, carrying it in the vague direction of the capital.

You're not sure how you missed it before, but the bird is wearing a tiny backpack.

It contains a note, which reads "A little something to help you celebrate" along with:

glory.name: Hearth of Glory
glory.description:
Proof that you have Sức mạnh quân sự, and that you're prepared to keep it on its feet.
  • Allows summoning increasingly difficult enemies to prove your mettle
  • Each rank defeated will boost Daily Update Giá trị ròng

makers.name: Hearth of the Makers
makers.description:
Proof that gold has been flowing through your settlement, and that you have fine crafters.
  • Generates 5% Lãi suất hàng ngày on any Gold Coins you have on hand (up to 300 per day)
  • Boosts your Daily Update Giá trị ròng based on Gold Coins on hand

cheer.name: Hearth of Cheer
cheer.description:
Proof that you have happy, well-fed citizens, and nice places for them to live.
  • Boosts Daily Update Giá trị ròng based on the overall Morale of your citizens
  • Each day brings a new random buff for Thị trấn chúng tasfolk.

titan_defeated_town_bonus.name: Land Cleansed of Corruption
titan_defeated_town_bonus.description: With the defeat of its lurking Titan, this town's citizens can't help but be more cheerful.

bulletin_message.00: This calls for a celebration!

With a terrifying roar and a staggering blast of energy, the apparition of the Titan disintegrates, vanishing into nothingness.

As the gloom fades, your citizens marvel at the clear sky stretching out above them, and the land itself seems to breathe a sigh of relief as the laws of nature return to normal.

alert_destroy_crops.title: A blight! We've lost some crops...

alert_initial_spawn_roots.title: The Titan has Roots everywhere, below the ghostly tentacles. Dig them up to hurt the Titan!

alert_new_bugs.title: Crawlers continue to emerge from the portals, hungry for your stockpiles

bulletin_message.00:
"Hello again, my friends of the Monkey! I hope this day finds you at peace.

Honorable Humans, I... have a confession to make."

"When I originally came to you, it was in hopes that you could be... useful to us." he says sheepishly, with drooped ears. "The Titan lurking beneath Thị trấn chúng ta has loomed over my people for generations. I saw in Thị trấn chúng ta a spark of hope that we might be free of its burden.

I apologize for not being more open about my motives before now. I hope I can be forgiven."

"I must admit, Thị trấn chúng ta surpassed my wildest dreams, managing to defeat a foe of such magnitude by your own strength alone.

But not only that - my people and I have grown fond of you beyond expectation, as well" he admits, smiling. "You have been faithful allies to us, and we have learned much from each other. I hope our two warrens can continue our budding friendship."

Sasha looks visibly relieved. "I am glad to hear it! I will take my leave of you for now, but I shall visit again! Once more, congratulations on cleansing your land of the Titan scourge, it is not something easily done. Farewell!"

[Select the Arbalest and Press the 'Awaken Titan' button when you're ready. Once the Arbalest has charged, hit the Fire button to damage the Titan. Killing or destroying the Titan's minions, tentacles, and roots will also reduce its health.]

[Good luck!]

"The Arbalest looks to be in working shape. Isn't it beautiful? The way it sparkles?"

He shakes his head to clear his mind. "Now is no time for distraction. Now that it's standing, all that's left is to activate it and call forth the Titan. Once that's happened, it's up to us to make sure it's charging, but I'll call on you to actually fire. It's Thị trấn chúng ta, so it only seems right"

"Only summon the Titan when you're ready for a siege. It will not be easy, and he will not be kind."
<TKTK Congrats>

"In fact, now that the evil has passed, there should be enough Hearth magic energy up here in the aboveground to support Lapines. So long as you keep that monument standing, you should expect some of us to ask to immigrate here, from time to time."

"Fantastic, I'll let them know post-haste!"

"Now, I... suppose that's all. Enjoy your celebrations!"
"By the stars! By the Divines! You did it! Chúng ta làm được rồi! Did you see the look on his face as he imploded? Kapowww!" Sasha says, with excitement you've never seen from him before.

greet.bulletin_title: Sasha leaps into the air, joyous!

bulletin_message.00:
"Oh, I see - it's not my place to decide, so I'll respect your wishes."

"Now, I suppose that's all the business - let's enjoy the celebrations!"

"Also... the Geomancer who worked most closely on the Arbalest, who made it happen at all, has expressed to me a desire to stay here beside it, among the people who defended it. I think they've earned their place here, but that's not for me to decide."

"What do you say, would you like this Rabbit Geomancer to join Thị trấn chúng ta?"
<TKTK Request 3>

Sasha stops, holding his knees and panting slightly. "Whew... oh... look, over at the Arbalest! It seems... its job is done, and now it's gone dormant. Let's have it serve as a monument, a memorial, to what the friendship of our two clans could achieve!"

intro.choice_000: I'm glad we could do some good

bulletin_message.00:
Would you like to let this Rabbit to join Thị trấn chúng ta?

[They're surprisingly fast for their low Body!]

bulletin_message.00:
This sounds crazy, but I swear I saw an oversized pair of rabbit ears poking out from behind a bush for a second on my way here.

Reminds me of the old tales about rabbit-people. You don't think...

msg1.choice_000: Huh! Maybe we should put some carrots out...
msg1.choice_000b: Huh! Maybe we should put some vegetables out...

bulletin_message.00:
We left those carrots out overnight, and in the morning they were gone... along with the baskets.

Strange...

We left those veggies out overnight, and in the morning they were gone... along with the baskets.

Strange...
We'll leave the veggies out past the edge of town overnight. Wonder if they'll still be there in the morning...
We'll leave the carrots out past the edge of town overnight. Wonder if they'll still be there in the morning...

00b_sighting_quest.title: Veggies for a maybe-Rabbit
00b_sighting_quest.text: Let's leave some vegetables out overnight, just in case.

00_sighting_quest.title: Carrots for a maybe-Rabbit
00_sighting_quest.text: Let's leave some carrots out overnight, just in case.

bulletin_message.00: "Thank you! I think I lost them, so we should have some time."

heal.choice_000: Let us get some supplies together.

bulletin_message.00: "Thank you! I'll lead them here, make sure you're ready for them!"
"I understand. I haven't heard any howling in a while, I think your human odors might have thrown them off. I'll make a break for it, the long way around..."
"Thank goodness, I have nowhere else to turn. I'll hide somewhere, let me know when you're ready."
A wounded rabbit limps into town, panting. "Help! Aid! I was scouting and was caught out by a group of kobolds. I made it this far, but I'm hurt and I think their wolves are tracking me..."

msg1.choice_000: Stay and rest. We'll protect you.
msg1.choice_001: We can patch you up so you can make it home.
msg1.choice_002: I'm sorry, we can't help. Good luck

bulletin_message.000:
"Thanks, you truly saved me.

...so, the Kobolds may have been chasing me because I might have stolen these from them..." the young rabbit says, bashfully.

"Here, you've earned them."

[Rabbit reputation increased]

14_chase_scene_quest_b.title: Chase Scene: Heal the rabbit
14_chase_scene_quest_b.text: Let's patch up the rabbit with some bandages and healing tonics.

bulletin_message.00:
"Here is Thị trấn chúng tasperson, back safe and sound! I think they found the change in scenery to be invigorating, and we certainly found them to be quite helpful!"

[Rabbit reputation increased, and your citizen is in high spirits!]

"We have need of an experienced Carpenter for two days, to help with bracing a tunnel and putting up new vegetable storage.""

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"We have need of an experienced Blacksmith for two days, to help us with forging some new digging equipment."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"My Herbalists would like to compare notes with one of your own for a couple of days."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"Dear humans, some of my clan respect the efficiency of your Trappers. Could one visit for two days, so that we might learn their methods and adapt them for our own use?"

"We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"Would you be willing to send one of your experienced Cooks as a liaison for two days? We would love to learn more about human cuisine."

" We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"We have need of an experienced Weaver for two days, to help us understand this 'loom' contraption of theirs."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"Dear friends, I would like to request two days of an experienced Potter's time. My clan has focused on Masonry for so long that we would benefit from a Potter's instruction."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"We have need of someone with Engineering skills for around two days to help us trap a tunnel that goblins have discovered and we cannot afford to collapse."

"Would you be willing to spare someone? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

"Some of my clan are starting to experiment with aboveground farming, and would benefit greatly from consult with your expert Farmers."

"Would you be willing to spare someone for a couple of days? We will provide the supplies, and they will be an honored guest of the warren."

bulletin_message.00:
"My dear human friends! It has been generations since we Lapine have found an ally as trustworthy as you. We have decided to offer you a precious gift."

"We would like to bring one of your own into our warren for a time, to teach them the art of Geomancy."

"Do you understand how vital Geomancy is to us, of the history of my kind and of Clan Amberstone?"

Sasha nods sagely. "This world of Hearth is ruled by the Heavenly Cycles. Each eon brings a different entity to Ascendance, who raises their own kind to an evolved state."

"Monkey is in Ascendance now, giving you Humans form and cleverness. Snake was before, and has waned, its Orcs slowly reverting to their lizard nature. Rabbit before that; long ago, but you can find our statues dotting the landscape even now."

"Now then, to business - would you like to send one of your esteemed citizens with me to learn the ways of Geomancy? I estimate it will take at least a week to grant them a basic understanding."

"This may be your only chance to do so - I feel the elders may change their minds again in a hare's breath."
"I see. Are you sure? As I said, this may likely be your only chance to gain such knowledge."

Sasha continues. "Rabbit left Ascendance, and Snake uplifted the Orcs. The Orcs were unsatisfied sharing the world indefinitely, and rejected our attempts to teach them Geomancy, saying it was against the will of the Cycle and that Hearth’s magic was forbidden; dangerous and volatile."

"In truth, they were not wrong."

"Very well, I suppose things of the Rabbit stay of the Rabbit after all."

"I shall take my leave for now. I still count you as dear friends and allies, so I will be back in touch before long! Farewell!"

"During our Cycle, we Lapine studied its magic deeply. We began to understand the nature of the magical Divine Harmonics produced from the Cycle and which grant our uplifted form. We also learned that Hearth exudes magic, the manipulation of which became known as Geomancy".

"We learned to harness this Hearth magic, our Geomancers attuning it through amberstones such that it keeps us from devolving back to the simple fuzzy creatures you see hopping around the surface now."

story2.choice_000: But it didn't work on everyone?

bulletin_message.00:
"Still, our largest cities were using up magic energy faster than Hearth could produce it, forcing us to scatter. At the same time, radical factions of Orc were hostile to us, forcing us to consolidate. We were at an impasse."

"So, my ancestors made the drastic choice to go underground, taking the name Amberstone and building tunnels and settlements along Leylines mapped by Lapine Geomancers. These seams of intense magic energy let them survive underground indefinitely."

"Splendid! Take all the time you need in choosing, the selection is important indeed."

"As I said, they will be gone for around seven days, so don't send anyone you can't bear to be without."
"You... are not wrong, friend. There is more to the story, but perhaps the time is not yet right."

"Your wayfaring student of Geomancy has returned as a full-fledged Geomancer! They proved themselves an able practitioner of the magic arts indeed!"

"Here - these precious Hearthbloom flowers coalesce traces of Hearth's magic into Bản chất lò sưởi, which Geomancers can use in their craft - be sure to plant them."

simple_message.choice_000: Welcome back, and thank you all!

30_geomancy_quest.text: Select a citizen to be trained as a Geomancer by Clan Amberstone.

The visitor wanders carefully away.

bulletin_message.00: A small, hooded figure approaches, meekly. "I have heard of your vegetables," she says. "Allow me to take some, and by my honor, it will be a worthwhile trade."
bulletin_message.01: "You have vegetables, yes? Perhaps an exchange in kind?" says a strange, small hooded figure. It seems she wants to trade for vegetables?
bulletin_message.02: A hooded figure appears, silently and seemingly out of nowhere. "Greetings. I have taken a risk for the chance at your garden's bounty. Perhaps a trade?" It seems she means that she wants some vegetables...
bulletin_message.03: A small, hooded figure approaches, meekly. "I have heard of your vegetables," he says. "Allow me to take some, and by my honor, it will be a worthwhile trade."
bulletin_message.04: "You have vegetables, yes? Perhaps an exchange in kind?" says a strange, small hooded figure. It seems he wants to trade for vegetables?
bulletin_message.05: A hooded figure appears, silently and seemingly out of nowhere. "Greetings. I have taken a risk for the chance at your garden's bounty. Perhaps a trade?" It seems he means that he wants some vegetables...

msg1.choice_000: Sure thing! Let's get some baskets...

bulletin_message.00: Your clan has proven gracious, and your gardens savory. Many of my kin mistrust the progeny of Monkey, but I feel we must extend a paw of friendship.

"I leave you with a parting gift of these Stone-Cut Lanterns, may they light your path in the darker times ahead."

The visitor presents you with several odd, ornate stone lanterns, and then departs, disappearing into the foliage with practiced speed.
A hooded figure approaches, hesitating for a moment before finally removing their hood...

Two long ears spill out, the rabbit-person shaking their head a little as they straighten out.

"Honorable greetings. I am Sasha Lightfoot of the twenty-third warren of Amberstone. I apologize for the deception, but it was deemed necessary."
For the present, I must return home, but I shall return in the coming days. Farewell, humans.

Our burrow is hidden away, not far from here. We have been observing you for a time, and your clan seems trustworthy. Not all of my kin trust the progeny of Monkey, but I feel we should extend a paw of friendship.

msg2.choice_001: Welcome to Thị trấn chúng tôi!

bulletin_message.00: It has been generations since Rabbitkind could set foot on the aboveground for long - and I hope perhaps you can help us with this in the future...

msg3.choice_000: Let us know what we can do

bulletin_message.00: A hooded figure approaches, hesitating for a moment before finally removing their hood...

Two long ears spill out, the rabbit-person shaking their head a little as they straighten out.

"Honorable greetings. I am Sasha Lightfoot of the twenty-third warren of Amberstone. I apologize for the deception, but my kind has been poorly received before, and we had to ensure our own safety."

bulletin_message.000:
The Rabbit diplomat Sasha Lightfoot approaches.

"Your gestures of friendship have not gone unnoticed. Somebun from the warren wanted you to have this."

He hands you a rough-hewn bag, containing:
bulletin_message.001:
Sasha, the Amberstone Envoy pads into town.

"I continue to be heartened by our burgeoning friendship. A gift, from my clan."

He hands you a rough-hewn bag, containing:
bulletin_message.002: "I am not here on official business this time - a relative of mine heard me speak of you, and thought you might be able to use this."
bulletin_message.003: "A small token of our appreciation of our friends of the Monkey." He smiles amicably and extends a paw to you, holding:

bulletin_message.00:
"Thank you, I'm sure the little Snake ones will find these quite satisfactory. May our friendship ever blossom!." He offers you glittering bags as payment.

[Rabbit reputation increased]

"Thank you. I hope we are not injured, but fortune favors the prepared. May our friendship continue to take root!" He hands you some glittering bags as compensation.

[Rabbit reputation increased]

"Then we shall give them a fight! Please send the health tonics as soon as they are ready."

"Let's say eight of them, for good luck?" he says, smiling, as if you had any idea what that meant.
Sasha nods. "A burrow must see to its own. We have faced worse, we shall persevere." They leave, returning to their hidden home.
"Excellent! Please let me know as soon as the doors are ready!"

"Some goblins somehow found an entrance to our hovel and are asking for... a bunch of wooden doors? We have neither wood nor carpenter on paw, so could you perhaps craft some for us?

Alternatively, we're not afraid to fight them off, but we lack the means to heal our injured afterwards."

bulletin_message.000:
"Wonderful! Thank you! Here, take this, as payment."

[Rabbit reputation increased]

bulletin_message.00: "Of course the green part! We'd never eat the disgusting red fruit part, it's all... squishy. Keep those and do with them what you wish," says Sasha, disgusted.
"I hope the Heirbloom is growing nicely. Let us know when some of their delicious, green stalks are ready for me to take back to my people!"

"Thank you! My respect for you humans continues to grow. Farewell for now!"

He wanders off, mumbling to himself, "Mmm... I can't imagine my warren will be upset if one or two are missing from the bundle..."

[Rabbit reputation increased]
"Fantastic! I'll show them how to plant it, at least, as far as I've been told. I shall return eagerly once it's had a chance to grow!"

"Greetings! I come asking a favor a long time in the making. There is a plant, known to my people as 'Heirbloom', which has not been grown for a long time. It needs the sun to flourish, and we've been unable to stay aboveground long enough to tend it for many years."

"These seeds have been passed down in my warren for generations, and I would be grateful, and honored, if you could grow them for us."

msg1.choice_000: Exciting! Our farmers would be happy to.

bulletin_message.000: "Awww... alright, I might come back later." They wander off, clearly pouting.
bulletin_message.001: "I see, sorry to bother you. Maybe send word if more sprouts up?"

bulletin_message.000: Thỏ approaches, cautious but friendly. "Hello, um, I heard Sasha got that Heirbloom from you. Could I trade you for some?"
bulletin_message.001: Thỏ finds her way into town, on the lookout for anything nasty. "Dear humans, could I perhaps trade you for some Heirbloom? It's ever so tasty, and Sasha told us we should come get to know you better..."

bulletin_message.00:
"Ahh, the full brilliance of an Amberstone is a sight to behold! Thank you for your kind service, take these in thanks."

[Rabbit reputation increased]
"I understand. Perhaps next time. Farewell, humans."

"Charging them is simple - just place them anywhere in sunlight or moonlight, and they will gather energy on their own."

"The... only issue is that creatures tend to be attracted to the Amberstones at night. So, either prepare to defend against them, or be sure to take the crystals down before nightfall."
"Splendid, I'll lay the Charging Stones by your banner. I'll return for them once they've been deployed and gathering light for long enough - sunlight or moonlight, it all comes from the same place."

"Greetings, kind humans. As you know, we live undergound, and because of that we rely on Amberstone, our namesake material, for many things."

"Amberstones can absorb many kinds of energy, sunlight being one of them - and these stones here have lost their glow."

"In Rabbit culture, when a new warren is dug, it exchanges statues with its neighbors to symbolize a mutual welcoming. We know you are unaware of this, but have come to offer this for our part"

Sasha gestures to the beautifully chiseled statue of smooth, cool stone ornamented with intricate weavings and a golden core of what must be Amberstone.

"This partnership somewhat unprecedented, but we think that you may represent hope for us against the coming darkness."

"You shall see us again soon! Oh, and feel free to keep the cricket golem, it would slow me down on the return trip. Farewell!"

Sasha Lightfoot approaches, a small load-bearing stone insect bobbling along behind him. "Friends! Not long ago, my kind were afraid of you kin of Monkey, but you have dissolved our purposeless trepidation! We have found in you a dependable ally in the aboveground!"

msg1.choice_002: It's been nice knowing you as well

bulletin_message.00:
"I will leave this Amberstone Pedestal. Build or choose a nice home with two beds, and place this pedestal there. Once all is prepared, I will return with my kin!

Place the Amberstone Pedestal near two beds, with a high enough appeal - check the name of the placed item for live updates!
Sasha nods. "Very well. They will no doubt be disappointed, but it will bring me some comfort to have them settle closer to the safety of the warren."

"Splendid! Some accomodations must first be made. You see, the Amberstone crystals are more than a mere light source - they are also what keeps us from reverting to the simple animals you see hopping around the surface."

"Never fear, such a process takes considerable time. All the same, Thỏ home would not be comfortable without an Amberstone at its center."
"So, a pair of my more adventurous kin are interested in immigrating to the aboveground. In fact, they specifically asked me to ask you if you might have a place for them here."

msg1.choice_000: Yes, we would love to have them!
msg1.choice_001: No - but we wish them the best!

bulletin_message.00: "What a nice home you've built for them! They will be here shortly, and I'm sure they'll be charmed!"

"It's working! The weapon is charging!!"

"Hold off whatever foul tricks the Titan has in store for us, and I'll let you know when it's ready to fire!"
"It's charged again! Fire at will!"
"It's charged!!! Fire at will!" Sasha shouts at you, covering his sensitive ears.

Sasha leaps into the air in excitement. "Direct hit!!! Take that, you big ugly squid!"

Calming down a little, he turns to you. "It will take time to recharge - I'll let you know when it's ready again. Keep up the defense, we must stay standing."

Sasha's features soften and his shoulders relax, an enormous weight clearly lifted from him. He speaks, ears folded subtly back and eyes glistening:

"Listen, I... thank you. Thank you. I have spent so much time worrying about my people's future, and you... you are proof that we can have one. That we can have a good one. We are forever in your debt."

"Thank you, and may your future be even brighter than ours."

conclusion_accept.choice_000: We merely repaid our peoples' debt to yours.
conclusion_accept.choice_001: We are honored to have helped.

request2.choice_001: No, but they have our thanks

bulletin_message.00:
Sasha nods his head. "While Human cleverness brought the entity, human cleverness also forestalled its cataclysm. As the entity tore open the leyline, the surviving humans knew they had to act, as the great evil was bathed in magic and growing in strength by the second."

"Hearth's magic is volatile. The humans, desperate, somehow catalyzed a reaction which turned the magic energy into pure magic force."

"The entity was shattered into countless fragments, not killed but, rather, transformed into a miasma of aimless evil that swept over the land, emanating from the ravaged crater that was once the seat of the Phoenix Empire."

"This is what we know as 'the cataclysm'."

"So - an eon passed; Snake declined, Monkey Ascended. Some say Monkey is a newcomer, and snatched Ascendancy from Snake early, but that’s another story. Either way, Humans built with startling speed, and the Phoenix Empire spanned the continent within three generations."

"Unsatisfied with mere subsistence underground, my ancestors contacted the Phoenix, who proved amenable to us."

"In fact, our teachings of Geomancy fascinated them. As is their nature, the Phoenix researchers made fast progress in utilizing Hearth’s magic, without truly understanding it. They put it to use without any concern for consequences."

Sasha nods, sighing. "I understand; each warren has challenges of its own to face. Still, we will find a way to complete work on the Titan weapon on our own, and return with it once it is ready."

"May our friendship continue to blossom," he says, bowing slightly and taking his leave.

"Recall what I told you before, of my people's rise when Rabbit was in Ascendance, of the discovery of Geomancy and amberstone that allows us to keep this upright form even once Snake Ascended and Rabbit waned."

"I told you, too, of how my clan took to living underground, driven by both hostility and a lack of magic on Hearth's surface. That's where I left off, correct?"

"The Phoenix capital was built on the ruins of an ancient Lapine city, which was in turn built on a nexus of Leylines. This meant it was an enormously powerful wellspring of magic."

"Human Geomancy researchers built devices to extract this magic; to store it and focus it beyond anything we had ever imagined possible, and well beyond the bounds of safety or sanity. And then, a portal was opened."

"Nobody knows if it was intentional, or if the strain of all that channeled magic simply tore a hole in reality. What we do know is that an entity was drawn through it, ravenous for magical energy and abhorrent of all other life."

"So now, to the favor. There is, beneath this land, a nascent Titan. This fragment of the great evil grows, seeping farther underground more each year, forcing my people farther and farther underground to not be cut off from the magic of Hearth and be doomed to have our descendants revert to mere rabbits."

"But: we have found an answer. We have nearly completed construction of a weapon drawn from ancient designs, capable of manifesting the Titan, and capable of destroying it for good."

"However, we require your help in finishing it, and… we require Thị trấn chúng ta to protect it. We lack the strength or the numbers to withstand the wrath of a manifested Titan for long, and this weapon will take time to do its job. Will you help us?"

favor1.choice_000: What do you need from us?

bulletin_message.00:
Sasha's eyes sparkle, full of relief and gratitude. "I was right to have put my trust in you. Please, prepare your citizens to visit with us for a time, and I will return with the finished device in time."

"Perhaps use this time to store some food, shore up your defenses, and train your military. Perhaps enlist some citizens in a town guard, or build a fortified structure? One cannot be sure in what form the Titan's ire will manifest."

"Dear friends of the Monkey, I bring greetings and well wishes from the twenty-third warren of Amberstone."

"I have a… momentous favor to ask of you, but I think perhaps you lack the context to understand it. Am I right that the history of the Phoenix Empire became lost to you humans after the cataclysm?"

"Humans, sensible, fled; to the coasts, to the northern mountains. Only recently have you started to build inwards again. Orcs, stubborn, stayed and fought the corruptions, fought the apparitions of a natural world brought to anger, defending the lands abandoned by the humans. And we Lapine, already underground, were content to wait."

"But as the evil energies settled, they embedded in the ground, drawn downwards towards the source of Hearth’s magic. These fragments absorb that magic, slowly gaining strength over generations, congealing into malevolent aspects which your people have come to call ‘Titans’."

Sasha nods, exhaling deeply. "I understand. 'If a favor is not asked lightly, neither is it accepted lightly'. Our current warren will continue to serve for years yet before the darkness encroaches.

"We will complete work on the Titan weapon on our own, and then return. Hopefully you will have a change of heart. May our friendship continue to blossom," he says, with both sadness and sincerity, and takes his leave.

"First, I will need to borrow some of your citizens: One experienced Mason to double-check our work, an experienced Blacksmith to help with reinforcement, plus two other citizens of your choosing to... help reach the tall parts."

"With that complete, we will return with the weapon, and once you have prepared, we will use it to summon, attack, and destroy the Titan. The attack may take some significant time, so you should prepare for a siege."

"I should say... this evil is of no immediate threat to you. This is a task to benefit your people's children, and mine."

Sasha returns, along with a massive, sparkling bow teetering precariously atop a skittering golem.

"I know you previously declined to assist us with fighting the Titan," he says, "but we completed this Arbalest despite your refusal. It took sacrifice, but we knew not what else to do."

"It serves no use within our warren, so we have brought it here as a reminder of our request. If you decide to face the slumbering evil, merely deploy the Crystalline Arbalest and I will instruct you further.

Sasha returns, along with a massive, sparkling bow teetering precariously atop a skittering golem.

"It took sacrifice, but we have completed the Crystalline Arbalest to the specifications of my ancestors. I... hope it works."

"If you are still open to fighting this monstrosity, signal your readiness by deploying the Arbalest, and I'll instruct you in its usage."

Sasha returns, followed by your dispatched citizens and a massive, sparkling bow balanced atop a skittering golem.

"I have returned, not only with your citizens, but with a completed Crystalline Arbalest, built to the specifications of my ancestors. I... hope it works."

"Signal your readiness by deploying it, and I'll instruct you in its usage."
The Rabbit Geomancer brought some Hearthbloom, Bản chất lò sưởi, and raw materials along with them, to help start their new aboveground practice.

bulletin_message.00: "Splendid! I think even a novice Mason and Weaver would work just fine, so long as they're receptive to teaching. It shouldn't take more than two days."
"Hum. Well, I suppose maybe I still have much to learn about human aesthetics after all..."

"Kind greetings, human friends! I was struck by an idea after watching your crafters at work - how would you like to send a Mason and a Weaver down to our warren for a few days, to learn our various crafting recipes and techniques?"

"Oh. I thought it was a clever idea, myself."

"Are you certain? I'll not offer again, you see."

reject.choice_000: Nah, not a fan of your style

bulletin_message.00:
Your venturing Mason and Weaver have returned, with knowledge of all sorts of Rabbit recipes!

"I must say, your citizens shared tales of the poh-yoh paht-pai with us. I simply must try it sometime..."

msg1.choice_000: It's good to have them back - thank you!

40_recipe_sharing_quest.title: Lapine Style
40_recipe_sharing_quest.text: Select a Mason and Weaver (Levels 1+) to go learn Amberstone recipes

amberstone_statue_ghost.description: A beautifully carved Amberstone rabbit statue.

bulletin_message.000: Upon reaching a point near the banner, the three masked individuals stop.  Everything about them is strange.  Their faces are completely covered by their masks, their heads covered in hoods, their hands covered in gloves, their feet [so small!] are sheathed in the tiniest of boots.  The material of their garments seems to be of some otherworldly origin, shining in the sun and blowing in the breeze.  And - most notably - they each have a beautiful golden necklace set with a massive sapphire.

msg2.bulletin_title: The figures stop at the banner
msg2.dialog_title: The figures stop at the banner

bulletin_message.000: The masked figures look about them, inspecting buildings and garments.  They seem as interested in our clothing as we are of theirs.  The smallest one reaches out as though to touch one of our boots, but the tallest one makes a quick hissing noise which forces the little one to straighten back up.

Emma reaches under her robes and withdraws a beautiful golden scepter with a magical fire as it’s ornament:

'Of Hestia, the Light. As gift, we bring. Nothing in return, we request... Understanding perhaps, friendship one day?'

msg8.choice_000: Thank you for this wondrous gift!

bulletin_message.000:
Dylan places an arm onto Lily’s shoulder to calm and silence her, then addresses the crowd himself:

'In need, many. Of Hestia, heirs travel. Masks, we don, in self-abnegation. The darkness to push, the Light we bring. Through sacrifice and oblation, our worth to lead we prove. To those without power, a hand of support we offer.'

The smallest figure raises their hands above their head and then bows deeply. As they move, their mysterious cloth flows and trails behind in motion. Their voice sounds more similar to squeaking gears than that of a voice we are used to, and is slightly muffled from behind the mask:

'Lily. Of Hestia, Princess, Painter [giggle], Healer, Archer.'

greet_lily.choice_000: A pleasure to meet you Princess Lily.

bulletin_message.000:
The middle sized figure then raises their hands similarly and bows. This figure’s movements are more quick and snappy, and the cloth appears to be trying to catch up to the limbs movement before it. There is a sense of wild strength behind these movements, and again the voice is not as expected - this time even more shrill and cracking occasionally:

'Dylan. Of Hestia, Prince, Poet, Smith, Warrior.'
After forceful motions and the brandishing of weapons, the three masked peoples turn and move off in another direction.
They seem peaceful, greeting anyone who comes close with a strange but simple motion: spreading their hands open wide in a circle, then clasping them together as they bow their heads.

msg1.bulletin_title: A group of three masked people calmly make their way towards the banner

bulletin_message.000:
The tallest figure takes a step forward and begins to speak. They make a large flourish of greetings with their arms, seeming to encompass all those Linh vật who are nearby, and then speaks - their voice soft and a few octaves higher than their size suggested.

'Disciples of Monkey, Greetings! Of Hestia we travel. From royalty our lineage. We introduce, please.'

msg4.bulletin_title: The tallest figure begins to speak
msg4.dialog_title: The tallest figure begins to speak

bulletin_message.000:
While Emma speaks, she takes a moment to look into the eyes of each person gathered around her:

'For our great journey, we trek under the stars. Of great abundance, darkness and pain we find. Found as before, royals of Hestia declared. In need, many...'

Lily quickly steps forward, unable to contain the emotion bubbling out from behind her mask:

'Many! Bruised and beaten, many your kind! As well Goblin, Orc! Bandage and salve, many wounds! Of great pain also, Turtle Lizard - so cute! [giggle] To keep Lily wanted, Dylan denied. Before release, nursed to good health. Waddled away, SO cute! To heal Lily finds...'

msg6.choice_001: You’re quite a spit-fire aren’t you?

bulletin_message.000: Ah, as well Emma remembers. In need, many still. The darkness to push... the Light will you take?

The tallest figure repeats the gesture, bowing impossibly low. Though largest, this figure moves with the most grace. The cloth rippling smoothly behind their limbs as though it were flowing through water:

'Emma. Of Hestia, Princess, Eldest Heir, Diplomat, Weaver, Lancer.'

greet_emma.choice_001: All of you are welcome to Thị trấn chúng tôi.

bulletin_message.000: Having completed their task the three then walk off into the wilderness, presumably to find the next community in need.  What an interesting people...

msg1.choice_000: Hopefully they remain safe in their travels.

bulletin_message.000:
Lily begins bouncing in excitement:

'Yes, oh! Bruised and beaten are your people?! Help I can, to heal Lily finds great joy!'

With a large flowing gesture of approval from Emma, Lily rushes around the village to tend to any wounds she finds - large or small alike.

Emma places the scepter on the ground and slowly backs away, her garments flowing behind her. After a moment she looks around at the different faces of the crowd:

'Of great curiosity, we are. Stay for a while, to converse and learn, may we?'

msg1.choice_000: Stay as long as you like!
msg1.choice_001: One of you said you’re a healer?

bulletin_message.000:
With one final flourish, Emma turns to face away from the town, Dylan and Lily do the same. With her back turned, Lily speaks:

'Our journey, continue we must [giggle]. To more in need, the light we bring.'

I am a spirit, from a time and people long past. I have lingered here for countless ages, guarding that which was most precious to us. But my power has waned, and now it has come under siege - please, lend me your assistance!

information.bulletin_title: The voice coalesces into a figure

bulletin_message.000: Please, help me!  My castle has come under siege by undead minions of evil!

msg1.bulletin_title: A voice whispers at the edges of your mind

bulletin_message.000: There's no time! The undead claw at my gates, and I have no strength left to defend the trove once they make it through! I beg of you, help!

theres_no_time_to_explain.bulletin_title: The dragonborn king presence is overbearing

bulletin_message.000: It has been many cycles.. too many. My family line lives no longer, and my body failed me long ago. My soul has been of the dragon's watch long enough to see many races born and die.  Yours has been of great interest, Children of Monkey, as my vigil comes to an end.

information_howlong.bulletin_title: The dragonborn king sighs and sags visibly

bulletin_message.000: Thank you for coming to my rescue. I have long guarded this site, but I can no longer raise my sword or shield in its defense.

msg1.choice_002: How long have you been here?

bulletin_message.000: My name is Flox, of the Icedragon lineage. I was King, once, of the Dragonborn peoples, who ruled this land in an age long past.

information_who.choice_001: How long have you been here?

bulletin_message.000: I am fading fast, but I have given the last of my spirit to this egg of the Great Dragon, so that the dragonling inside may finally hatch out into this world. I have known you for little time, Children of Monkey, but I trust you will aid this young welp as you have aided me. May you carry yourselves with strength and compassion, as the Dragonborn once did.

hatch_and_attach.bulletin_title: The Dragonborn King breathes softly into the egg in front of him
hatch_and_attach.choice_000: We will honor you, King. May you be at peace.

bulletin_message.000: It is a King's duty to protect the Great Dragon's lineage - a duty that endures even through death.  My spirit has kept this place hidden, veiled from sense and sight, for as long as it could.  I see now that I can maintain my vigil no longer, and that the Dragon's lineage is at risk.

information_what.bulletin_title: The dragonborn king straightens his back in pride
information_what.choice_000: How can we help with the lineage thing?
information_what.choice_002: How long have you been here?

bulletin_message.000: I can stand no longer. The trove has fallen, and with it the last light of my people. I was a fool to stay silent so long...

msg1.bulletin_title: The voice returns, seemingly with great effort

carrying_buff.description: Mang vác vật nặng tự nhiên khiến con người di chuyển chậm hơn

combat_basics.display_name: Huấn luyện chiến đấu cơ bản
combat_basics.description: Tăng lòng can đảm thông qua giờ huấn luyện chiến đấu

groggy_buff.description: Đêm khó ngủ trên mặt đất làm giảm tốc độ 25%. Giường sẽ tốt hơn nhiều!

compassionate_shepherd_buff.description: Được chăm sóc bởi người chăn cừu nhân ái. Con vật này sẽ tạo ra nhiều tài nguyên và con cái hơn.

shepherding_speed_bonus.description: Người chăn cừu giờ đã thành thạo hơn trong việc đưa bầy đi nhanh hơn một chút.

stenched_shepherd_buff.description: Động vật có thể ngửi thấy rằng người chăn cừu này đã giết gì đó gần đây. Người chăn cừu này sẽ không thể tìm thấy động vật hoang dã mới cho đến khi mùi hôi thối biến mất.

shepherding_solitary.description: The shepherd is at peace in nature, and desires conversation less often.

snared_buff.description: Dính bẫy và không thể di chuyển

starving_buff.description: Linh vật bỏ đói rất cần thức ăn!

starving_animal_buff.description: Con vật này đang đói! Yêu cầu đầu bếp tạo ăn để người chăn cừu của bạn có thể cho nó ăn.

stopped_buff.description: Đặt da này cho ai đó cần dừng lại, ngay lập tức.

injured_buff.description: Moving slower due to low health.

bed_ridden_buff.description: Slowly recovering from injuries. Can receive medical care from herbalists.

strength_tonic_buff.description: Muscle increased greatly for more combat damage.

undead_infection.description: Prevents natural health recovery via willpower.

courage_tonic_buff.description: Courage increased for a short while.

energy_tonic_buff.description: Energy increased for a short while.

minor_courage_buff_buff.description: Small boost of courage while in alert mode

game_mode_hard_buff.description: In Hard Mode, enemies have more armor and health and will inflict more damage

snap_trap.description: Movement slowed after taking damage from trap

snap_trap_2.description: Movement greatly slowed after taking damage from a large trap

incapacitated_buff.description: Someone help this poor Linh vật!

recuperating_buff.description: Still incapacitated, but slowly recovering over time. An herbalist can help speed up recovery.

recently_treated_buff.description: This Linh vật was recently attended to by a medic and will need to rest awhile before another treatment.

forlorn_mood_buff.description: It's been incredibly hard going of late.

glum_mood_buff.description: Stuff hasn't been turning out as I would like.

content_mood_buff.description: All things considered, I'm doing okay.

town_alert_courage_buff.description: Increasing courage when defending the town as long as they are not attacked

town_alert_banner_buff.display_name: Cảnh báo thị trấn Banner Buff
town_alert_banner_buff.description: Emits a stacking courage buff every 5 minutes

furious_buff.description: +15% Damage. Will not flee or cower for a short time

lucky_buff.description: Everything's just that little bit easier today.

hit_by_sandstorm_debuff.description: I don't like the sand. It's coarse and rough and irritating.

cold_debuff.description: I'm freezing out here! I should get a roof above my head.

hit_by_titanstorm_debuff.description: The Storm of Evil has severely drained this Linh vật's energy. It's not fatal, but it's painful...

fast_day_buff.description: All citizens skip meals for the day.

hero_day_buff.description: Military units move 20% faster, have 30% stronger muscles, and are 2x as courageous.

muse_day_buff.description: Crafters gain +4% extra chance to create high quality items.

muse_day_individual_buff.description: Chance to create high quality items increased.

vigil_day_buff.description: All citizens skip sleeping for the night.

titan_trance_debuff.description: Overcome with visions of darkness. They'll snap out of it... hopefully.

titan_building_destroyer_waiting.description: Once this finishes waking up, it will destroy the structure!

tentacle_snared_debuff.description: Struggling in the tentacle's iron grip.

amberstone_visit_buff.description: Inspired, energized, and heartened by their visit to Clan Amberstone

omnivore_buff.description: This pet will eat almost anything.

herbivore_buff.description: Con vật cưng này sẽ chỉ ăn thực vật.

carnivore_buff.description: Con vật cưng này sẽ chỉ ăn thịt.

teleportation_sickness_buff.description: Dịch chuyển rất khắc nghiệt với linh hồn, cần đợi một thời gian trước khi thực hiện lại.

ladder.description: Sử dụng đến những nơi cao

road.description: Để đi du lịch nhanh hơn

scaffolding.description: Cấu trúc hỗ trợ xây dựng

build_workshop.description: Tạo nơi để tăng năng suất!

destroy_entity.description: Không thể gỡ vật phẩm này khỏi thế giới!

harvest_berries.description: Bụi cây này tạo ra quả mọng có thể thu thập để nuôi người của bạn.
harvest_berries.disabled_description: Quả mọng trên bụi này vẫn chưa chín!

harvest_planted.description: Tiếp cận bất cứ thứ gì có sẵn.

loot_item.description: Yêu cầu vật phẩm này cho thị trấn của bạn.

move_item.description: Di chuyển thứ này đến nơi khác trên thế giới.
move_item.disabled_description: Vật phẩm này đang được sử dụng. Hãy thử di chuyển nó sau.

open_character_sheet.description: Xem kỹ hơn về Linh vật này

open_loot.description: Mở thùng chứa chiến lợi phẩm này để lấy vật phẩm của nó.

place_item.description: Đặt vật phẩm này trên thế giới.

plant_crop.description: Trồng một cái gì đó trong ô vuông này.

plant_turnip.description: Trồng củ cải trong ô vuông này.

promote_to_job.description: Cung cấp cho linh vật này công việc mới.

change_working_for.description: Change which town this citizen is Làm việc cho.

raze_crop.description: Xóa hoặc thu hoạch vật phẩm của mảnh đất này.

release_pet.description: Nói với con vật cưng này rằng bạn không muốn nó nữa.

restore_terrain.description: Restore the terrain to its original state.

show_workshop.description: Thợ chế tạo của bạn sử dụng xưởng để chế tạo vật dụng hữu ích cho việc định cư của bạn.
show_workshop.disabled_description: Thợ chế tạo của bạn sử dụng xưởng để chế tạo vật dụng hữu ích cho việc định cư của bạn. Trước khi bạn có thể chế tạo, bạn cần chỉ định thợ chế tạo cho xưởng này.

show_workshop_from_crafter.description: Thợ chế tạo của bạn sử dụng xưởng để chế tạo vật dụng hữu ích cho việc định cư của bạn.
show_workshop_from_crafter.disabled_description: Thợ chế tạo của bạn sử dụng xưởng để chế tạo vật dụng hữu ích cho việc định cư của bạn. Trước khi bạn có thể chế tạo, bạn cần chỉ định thợ chế tạo cho xưởng này.

slaughter.description: Thu hoạch con vật này để lấy thịt.
slaughter.disabled_description: Con vật này bị suy dinh dưỡng đến mức không có thịt. Nó chỉ là da và xương.
